title: Ep. 20 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: On this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave Tom Segura surprises Bert Kreischer by having the Stanley Cup brought into the studio and they learn about its history together! The two of them also revisit the idea of becoming dandies. The question "what is the youngest age you would date" is also explored. What's the youngest you would go?
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
